properties.name: Storage Deleted
properties.description: Detects when storage is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 41402
| extend Name = extract("Name=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    ["User Name"] = user,
    ["Object Name"] = Name,
    MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
